description: Variation of Condition 1 (Approved Plans), Condition 6 (Acoustic Report Measures) and Condition 8 (Kitchen Extraction Unit) of planning permission 19/2862/FUL, dated 31/10/2019 for `Creation of 5no. self-contained residential units. First floor rear extension, including Juliet balcony to rear elevation to No. 133. Roof extension, including 2no. rear dormer windows. New flues to roof slope. Associated refuse/recycling store, cycle store.`  Variation to include: Relocation of approved plant layout; Amendment to the internal layout of ground floor rear unit; 2 small windows within the ground floor rear elevation replacing existing door; Variation of approved documents; Amendment of the wording for Condition 6; Amendment of the wording for Condition 8
